subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramírez homered for the fourth time in six games with the Los Angeles Dodgers, who averted a three-game sweep in a 4-1 victory against the St. Louis Cardinals.
snippet: Manny Ramírez homered for the fourth time in six games with the Los Angeles Dodgers, who averted a three-game sweep in a 4-1 victory against the St. Louis Cardinals.
